title: Continued Discussion of 2013 Trends
content:
Gerald Celente is one of today’s pioneers in trend strategy. <!--more--> He founded the Trends Research Institute in Kingston NY and is the publisher of the Trends Journal that has been going on since 1980.
He has since been one of the nation’s most sought after diagnosticians and forecasters.
Recently the institute established offices in Europe.
Gerald’s insights have been sought for by major networks, PBS and BBC, Russian TV, and publications such as the Economist and major newspapers.
PUBLICATION: “The Trends Journal” is published 4 times a year at the website: www.trendsresearch.com
